correctness.rationale: Several key fields are incorrect or not traceable to the article and the multicomponent ALD supercycle is misrepresented. Specific issues: (1) Supercycle design is wrong: numberofSubcycles and subcycleSequence use a single 'InGaZnO' entry with count 12; the article specifies an indium‑rich supercycle InO:GaO:ZnO = 12:1:1 arranged sequentially (InO–GaO–ZnO). AldMethod/precursor mapping also collapses sub-oxides into one compound; it should list InOx (DADI), GaOx (TMGa), ZnO (DEZ), all via PEALD. (2) Dosing/purge times are fabricated (1 ms) and not reported; only plasma exposure of 1 s at 100 W is given. (3) Flow rates: 200 sccm refers to the mixed O2/Ar reactant; assigning 200 sccm to precursorFlow and purgingGasFlow is incorrect. (4) Thickness control: 11.86 Å is per supercycle, not per single sub-cycle; numberofCycles = 12 misinterprets the indium subcycle count within a supercycle (n = 12) rather than total ALD cycles; nucleationPeriod = 12 cycles is not reported. (5) Material properties contain many ungrounded or wrong items: refractiveIndex, absorptionCoefficient, IGZO band gap, resistivity, carrierDensity, Hall method, uniformity (5%), conformality (AR=1), roughness (AFM), filmDensity and units, elementalConcentration (1%), and atomicRatio (1.0:2.8:5.4) are not supported by the text; crystallinity method should be GIWAXS/TEM (amorphous matrix with ordered layers), not XRD. (6) OtherAspects: filmStability=True and reproducibility=True are not evidenced (thermal instability above 400 °C is reported). Correct values include PEALD, O2 plasma with Ar diluent/purge, 100 W plasma, 200 °C, 1.2 Torr, SiO2/Si substrates, 10 nm film thickness, and device metrics (μ_FE≈245 cm2/V·s, Vth≈0.17 V, SS≈74 mV/dec, I_on/I_off≈1.43×10^9). Review and correct: supercycle fields (12:1:1, sequence InO–GaO–ZnO), per-compound precursors, remove or leave unspecified dosing/purge times and precursor flows not given, fix growth-per-supercycle vs per-cycle, and limit material properties to those actually reported (structure by GIWAXS/TEM; composition as design ratio if clearly stated).

completeness.rationale: Several required elements are present, but many values are incorrect or untraceable to the article, and key supercycle details are misrepresented. Specific issues: (1) Supercycle design is wrong: article specifies an In:Ga:Zn subcycle ratio of 12:1:1 with sequence InO–GaO–ZnO (Section 2.1 and Fig. 1a), but the extraction lists a single compound ('InGaZnO') with count 12 and subcycleSequence ['InGaZnO']; it should specify separate subcycles for InO (12), GaO (1), ZnO (1) and the sequence ['InO','GaO','ZnO']. (2) Precursors are misassigned to the compound 'InGaZnO'; the article states DADI (In), TMGa (Ga), and DEZ (Zn) (Experimental Section), so each should be tied to its respective oxide subcycle, and the co-reactant should be Ar/O2 plasma rather than only 'O2 plasma'. (3) Thickness control misinterpretation: 11.86 Å is the growth per supercycle (Fig. 1), not per single ALD cycle; 'numberofCycles' = 12 and 'nucleationPeriod' = 12 are not supported and conflate the indium subcycle count with total cycles; the total number of supercycles to reach 10 nm is not reported. (4) DosingTime, PurgeTime, and FlowRates are largely fabricated: the article gives plasma on-time of 1 s and total Ar/O2 reactant flow 200 sccm (Experimental Section) but does not provide precursor/purge timing; using 1 ms times and assigning 200 sccm to 'precursorFlow' and 'purgingGasFlow' is not supported. (5) Material properties are mostly ungrounded: refractive index, absorption coefficient, resistivity, carrier density, roughness, density, uniformity %, and conformality aspect ratio are not reported; the crystallinity method is GIWAXS/TEM (Sections 2.1, 2.3), not XRD; film composition atomic ratio should reflect the designed 12:1:1 supercycle or report XRF/XPS values if given (only trends are provided). (6) Device properties are correctly captured (μFE ≈ 245 cm2 V−1 s−1, Vth ≈ 0.17 V, SS ≈ 74 mV/dec, Ion/Ioff ≈ 1.43×10^9; Figs. 2b–c and Table 1) and device structure matches (top-gate bottom-contact). (7) An additional ALD process (Al2O3 gate insulator via PEALD at 200 °C with TMA and the same plasma conditions) is described in the article (Device Fabrication) but omitted from the processes list. To improve completeness, correct the supercycle design (counts and sequence), map each precursor to its oxide subcycle with Ar/O2 plasma, revise or remove unsupported dosing/purge/flow values (use the 1 s plasma time for co-reactant dosing if represented), fix thickness control (supercycle GPC and unknown total cycles), update crystallinity characterization (GIWAXS/TEM with ordered InO/GaZnO in an amorphous matrix), and either provide only reported material-property values or omit those fields if the schema allowed. Consider adding a second process for the Al2O3 gate dielectric.
